title: Apply for a tax disc in advance

details.description: If your tax disc is due to run out while you're abroad, you can apply for a new one up to 2 months in advance.
details.body:
You can apply for a new tax disc up to 2 months before your current tax disc runs out.

You can apply in person or by post to:

  • a Post Office which issues tax discs
  • a DVLA local office

You will need:

  • your Registration Certificate (V5C)
  • a letter from you explaining why you are applying in advance
  • a filled-in form V10 or V85 (you can only use a V85 at a DVLA local office)
  • an insurance certificate or cover note, which must be valid when the new tax disc starts
  • an MOT or Goods Vehicle Testing (GVT) certificate (if you need one for your vehicle), which must be valid when the new tax disc starts
  • the payment for your vehicle tax - there is a Â£2.50 charge if you pay by credit card.

details.description: Getting and exchanging tax discs, tax rates and SORN
